contents.title: Get Started
contents.description: From your Markdown files to a deployed website in few minutes.

children.value: You can start playing with Docus in your browser using our online sandboxes:
Start a fresh Docus project with:

props.code: npx nuxi init docus-app -t nuxtlabs/docus-starter
yarn install
npm install
pnpm install --shamefully-hoist

children.value: to start your Nuxt content app in development mode:

props.code: yarn dev
npm run dev
pnpm run dev

children.value: ✨ Well done! A browser window should automatically open for

contents.title: Configuration
contents.description: How to configure the docs-theme package.

children.value: How to configure the docs-theme package.
The repository to use on GitHub links
The account to use on Twitter links
The channel to use on Youtube links
The account to use on Instagram links
The account to use on Facebook links
The account to use on Medium links
Override social or display custom one
A label to use for the social
A icon to use for the social
A link to use for the social
If set to a string, will be used in the header
links icons will show in the header
An array of path to exclude out from the header navigation
Will be used as default value for collapsible navigation categories
An array of path to exclude out from the aside navigation
An object defining the bottom left credits
The icon to use for the credits
The text to use for the credits
An array of icons to display in the footer
A label to use for the icon
A link to use for the icon
The icon to use (can be a component name)
Toggle "Edit this page on Github" component on documentation pages
Toggle contributors component on documentation pages
The root path to use for "Edit on Github" component

contents.title: Layouts
contents.description: Docus provides multiple built-in layouts for displaying your Markdown pages.

children.value: Docus provides multiple built-in layouts for displaying your Markdown pages.
The default layout for every page created in the project. This layout renders multiple section alongside the content:

props.code:
---
aside: true
footer: true
toc: false
---

Your awesome content

children.value:
---
aside: true
footer: true
toc: false
---

Your awesome content
Current page is live sample of default layout.
layout is content focused layout. This layout does not render aside menu of table of contents.
This layout accept some configuration from content front-matter.
in content front-matter the content will be rendered in full width.
: Using this option you can modify layout container look. Like constraining layout width of changing the background.
in front-matter will add horizontal padding in the layout.

props.code:
---
title: Home
layout: page
fuild: true
---

children.value:
---
title: Home
layout: page
fuild: true
---
as live sample of page layout
